nodes.documentation: @dev Make profit inside this contact
nodes.name: makeProfit

nodes.documentation: Converts all incoming ethereum to tokens for the caller, and passes down the referral addy (if any)
nodes.name: buy

nodes.documentation:
Fallback function to handle ethereum that was send straight to the contract
Unfortunately we cannot use a referral address this way.
Converts all of caller's dividends to tokens.
nodes.name: reinvest

nodes.documentation: Alias of sell() and withdraw().
nodes.name: exit

nodes.documentation: Withdraws all of the callers earnings.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: Liquifies tokens to ethereum.
nodes.name: sell

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from the caller to a new holder.
Remember, there's a 10% fee here as well.
nodes.name: transfer

nodes.documentation: In case one of us dies, we need to replace ourselves.
nodes.name: setAdministrator

nodes.documentation: Precautionary measures in case we need to adjust the masternode rate.
nodes.name: setStakingRequirement

nodes.documentation: If we want to rebrand, we can.
nodes.name: setName

nodes.documentation: If we want to rebrand, we can.
nodes.name: setSymbol

nodes.documentation:
Method to view the current Ethereum stored in the contract
Example: totalEthereumBalance()
nodes.name: totalEthereumBalance

nodes.documentation: Retrieve the total token supply.
nodes.name: totalSupply

nodes.documentation: Retrieve the tokens owned by the caller.
nodes.name: myTokens

nodes.documentation:
Retrieve the dividends owned by the caller.
If `_includeReferralBonus` is to to 1/true, the referral bonus will be included in the calculations.
The reason for this, is that in the frontend, we will want to get the total divs (global + ref)
But in the internal calculations, we want them separate.
nodes.name: myDividends

nodes.documentation: Retrieve the token balance of any single address.
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation: Retrieve the dividend balance of any single address.
nodes.name: dividendsOf

nodes.documentation: Return the buy price of 1 individual token.
nodes.name: sellPrice

nodes.documentation: Return the sell price of 1 individual token.
nodes.name: buyPrice

nodes.documentation: Function for the frontend to dynamically retrieve the price scaling of buy orders.
nodes.name: calculateTokensReceived

nodes.documentation: Function for the frontend to dynamically retrieve the price scaling of sell orders.
nodes.name: calculateEthereumReceived
ethereumToTokens_
tokensToEthereum_

nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add
